alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Tuscaloosa; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 7:28PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Walker, northeastern Tuscaloosa and western Jefferson Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bull City, or 15 miles northeast of Holt, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Birmingham, Gardendale, Fultondale, Sumiton, Dora, Pleasant Grove, Adamsville, Graysville, Sylvan Springs, Brookside, Mulga, Maytown, West Jefferson, Cardiff, Gorgas Steam Plant, Bull City, Edgewater, Forestdale, Concord and Burnwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Alabama. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and west central Alabama.
